error.heading: Something has gone wrong
error.introText: Something went wrong while you were using the service.
error.causesConcurrentUse: someone else from your business is using the service at the same time as you
error.causesTechnicalProblem: there's a technical problem with our service
error.homePagePrefix: You can try to complete your task again by returning to your
error.reportText: If you have received this message more than once today, you can report the problem to us.
